thread.title: Meet Michael Fassbender’s Walter in New ‘Alien: Covenant’ Clip
thread.title_full: Meet Michael Fassbender’s Walter in New ‘Alien: Covenant’ Clip

author: Jesse Bernard
title: Meet Michael Fassbender’s Walter in New ‘Alien: Covenant’ Clip
text:
If you’ve seen other films within the Alien franchise, you’ll be aware that the synthetic droids have been known to malfunction and attack other crew members, usually in preservation of the species they come across. In the forthcoming Alien: Covenant, Michael Fassbender stars as Walter, the next generation clone of the previous model, David, who featured in Prometheus. 
In this new clip, 20th Century Fox wants you to meet Walter, with the video acting as a faux Weyland-Yutani ad. Alien: Covenant opens in theaters on May 19.
In other related news, watch the official trailer for Netflix’ new original comedy Win It All.
